meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Russia.
meanings.sent1: In Russia, you can buy many things with a rouble.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for roubles at the bank.
meanings.sent3: Why did the rouble go to school? To learn how to multiply!
meanings.sent4: The rouble danced in my pocket, full of possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The shiny rouble gleamed in the sunlight, a symbol of wealth.

meanings.definition: A coin or note of this value.
meanings.sent1: I found a rouble on the street and picked it up.
meanings.sent2: She paid for her coffee with a rouble.
meanings.sent3: The rouble rolled away, playing hard to get.
meanings.sent4: His words were like a rouble, valuable and easily spent.
meanings.sent5: The rouble jingled in his pocket, a reminder of his trip to Russia.
